name: June Exhibit
description:
Play as a dead guy exploring alternate universes that are created from my real actual dreams. In some cases more loosely than others.  There's not much blood or horror in it, mostly just shitposty type worlds and characters.

A Yume Nikki fangame I made in like three weeks and then got bored of.

It's "version 0.0" or maybe even -0.1.

Thirteen effects, you can combine a few of them.

There's a few endings in here too
